snippet: The N.C.A.A. board of governors, which approved an extension last month for Emmert, the N.C.A.A.’s president, said it had voted unanimously to make it a three-year deal with a one-year option.
abstract: NCAA extends president Mark Emmert's contract through October 2020.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. board of governors, which approved an extension last month for Emmert, the N.C.A.A.’s president, said it had voted unanimously to make it a three-year deal with a one-year option.

headline.main: Mark Emmert Gets Contract Extension From N.C.A.A.
